org.apache.poi.ss.util

Class RegionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.ss.util.RegionUtil

  • public final class RegionUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Various utility functions that make working with a region of cells easier.(各种实用功能使处理细胞区域变得更容易。)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void setBorderBottom(BorderStyle border, CellRangeAddress region, Sheet sheet)
      Sets the bottom border style for a region of cells by manipulating the cell style of the individual cells on the bottom(通过操作底部各个单元格的单元格样式来设置单元格区域的底部边框样式)
      static void setBorderLeft(BorderStyle border, CellRangeAddress region, Sheet sheet)
      Sets the left border style for a region of cells by manipulating the cell style of the individual cells on the left(通过操作左侧各个单元格的单元格样式来设置单元格区域的左边框样式)
      static void setBorderRight(BorderStyle border, CellRangeAddress region, Sheet sheet)
      Sets the right border style for a region of cells by manipulating the cell style of the individual cells on the right(通过操作右侧单个单元格的单元格样式，设置单元格区域的右边框样式)
      static void setBorderTop(BorderStyle border, CellRangeAddress region, Sheet sheet)
      Sets the top border style for a region of cells by manipulating the cell style of the individual cells on the top(通过操作顶部各个单元格的单元格样式来设置单元格区域的顶部边框样式)
      static void setBottomBorderColor(int color, CellRangeAddress region, Sheet sheet)
      Sets the bottom border color for a region of cells by manipulating the cell style of the individual cells on the bottom(通过操作底部各个单元格的单元格样式来设置单元格区域的底部边框颜色)
      static void setLeftBorderColor(int color, CellRangeAddress region, Sheet sheet)
      Sets the left border color for a region of cells by manipulating the cell style of the individual cells on the left(通过操作左侧各个单元格的单元格样式来设置单元格区域的左边框颜色)
      static void setRightBorderColor(int color, CellRangeAddress region, Sheet sheet)
      Sets the right border color for a region of cells by manipulating the cell style of the individual cells on the right(通过操作右侧各个单元格的单元格样式，设置单元格区域的正确边框颜色)
      static void setTopBorderColor(int color, CellRangeAddress region, Sheet sheet)
      Sets the top border color for a region of cells by manipulating the cell style of the individual cells on the top(通过操作顶部单个单元格的单元格样式来设置单元格区域的顶部边框颜色)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • setBorderLeft

        public static void setBorderLeft(BorderStyle border,
                                 CellRangeAddress region,
                                 Sheet sheet)
        Sets the left border style for a region of cells by manipulating the cell style of the individual cells on the left(通过操作左侧各个单元格的单元格样式来设置单元格区域的左边框样式)
        Parameters:
        border - The new border(边境-新边境)
        region - The region that should have the border(区域-应该有边界的区域)
        sheet - The sheet that the region is on.(表-该区域所在的表。)
        Since:
        POI 3.16 beta 1
